content.raw: I made a few minor changes in [a3830d9](#!/osrf/vmrc/commits/a3830d9ccd2693def38c99edde47bbc28bf3733f?at=default). The most relevant is the use of a mutex to protect `lastCmdTime` and `currCmd` for each thruster, as there was risk of a race condition between the callback `OnThrustCmd()` and `Update()`. I left two minor suggestions/questions but ready to approve soon.
content.html: I made a few minor changes in a3830d9. The most relevant is the use of a mutex to protect lastCmdTime and currCmd for each thruster, as there was risk of a race condition between the callback OnThrustCmd() and Update(). I left two minor suggestions/questions but ready to approve soon.
